org.apache.tamaya.core.internal

Class OSGIServiceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.core.internal.OSGIServiceContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceContext

    public class OSGIServiceContext
extends Object
implements ServiceContext
    ServiceContext implementation based on OSGI Service mechanisms.

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()

      • ordinal

        public int ordinal()
        Specified by:
        ordinal in interface ServiceContext
        Returns:
        ordinal of the ServiceContext. The one with the highest ordinal will be taken.

      • getService

        public <T> T getService(Class<T> serviceType)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Access a service singleton via its type. If multiple implementations for the very serviceType exist then the one with the highest Priority will be used.
        Specified by:
        getService in interface ServiceContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service type.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the service type.
        Returns:
        The instance to be used, or null

      • create

        public <T> T create(Class<T> serviceType)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Factory method to create a type, hereby a new instance is created on each access. If multiple implementations for the very serviceType exist then the one with the highest Priority will be used as the base for creating subsequent instances.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ServiceContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service type.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the service type.
        Returns:
        The new instance to be used, or null

      • getServices

        public <T> List<T> getServices(Class<T> serviceType)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Access a list current services, given its type. The bootstrap mechanism should order the instance for precedence, hereby the most significant should be first in order.
        Specified by:
        getServices in interface ServiceContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the list element returned by this method
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the service type.
        Returns:
        The instance to be used, never null

      • getResources

        public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String resource,
                                     ClassLoader cl)
                              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Loads resources from the current runtime context. This method allows to use runtime specific code to load resources, e.g. within OSGI environments.
        Specified by:
        getResources in interface ServiceContext
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource, not null.
        cl - the desired classloader context, if null, the current thread context classloader is used.
        Returns:
        the resources found
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getResource

        public URL getResource(String resource,
                       ClassLoader cl)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
        Loads a resource from the current runtime context. This method allows to use runtime specific code to load a resource, e.g. within OSGI environments.
        Specified by:
        getResource in interface ServiceContext
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource, not null.
        cl - the desired classloader context, if null, the current thread context classloader is used.
        Returns:
        the resource found, or null.
